description: Arcadia is a real all-rounder: a versatile mid-layer for ultimate warmth and maximum performance on every adventure. The clean design, made from durable merino wool fleece, makes Arcadia the perfect year-round solution.
name: Mons Royale Arcadia Merino Fleece Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Merino Fleece - 59% Recycled Polyester, 36% Merino Wool, 5% Elastane - 265gsm
